Q: Will there be noticeable scars?

A: Incisions made during gynecomastia surgery are strategically placed to minimize visible scarring. Over time, scars typically fade and become less noticeable. I utilize advanced techniques to ensure that scarring is as discreet as possible, allowing you to enjoy your improved chest contour without undue concern.

Q: Are there any risks associated with gynecomastia surgery?
